thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Looking Beyond High-Net-Worth Clients

author: wsjcom
title: Looking Beyond High-Net-Worth Clients
text:
Lazetta Rainey Braxton • Founder and chief executive of Financial Fountains in Baltimore • Education: B.S. finance and international business, University of Virginia; M.B.A., Wake Forest University; Nebraska Certificate in Financial Planning, Metropolitan University of Omaha • Professional designations: Certified Financial Planner
Background: As a child, Ms. Braxton watched her parents struggle with their finances and noticed that there were no financial experts in the African-American community that they could turn to...
